metadata.name: Use Icacls to Hide File to Everyone
metadata.comment: Detect use of icacls to deny access for everyone in Users folder sometimes used to hide malicious files

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('icacls.exe') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\icacls.exe')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/deny')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('s-1-1-0:')))

output.summary: Detect use of icacls to deny access for everyone in Users folder sometimes used to hide malicious files
